## Policies

### Minimum Stay
- **Standard**: 2 nights
- **Holiday weekends**: 3 nights
- **Peak season** (May, September-October): 3 nights
- **Monthly stays**: Flexible start dates

### Check-in/Check-out
- **Check-in**: 4:00 PM (earlier if available)
- **Check-out**: 11:00 AM (later if available)
- **Luggage storage**: Available by arrangement

### Cancellation Policy
- **Platform bookings**: Per platform policy
- **Direct bookings**:
  - 30+ days notice: Full refund minus processing
  - 14-29 days: 50% refund
  - Less than 14 days: No refund unless re-booked

### Payment
- **Platforms**: Processed by Airbnb/VRBO
- **Direct**: 50% deposit, balance 30 days before arrival
- **Accepted**: All major credit cards, wire transfer
- **Monthly**: Can be paid in installments
